content:
att.media

provides attributes for specifying display and related properties of external media.
Moduletei â€” Declarations for classes, datatypes, and macros available to all TEI modules
MembersbinaryObject graphic media
Attributes
  • att.internetMedia ( @mimeType )
    • @width
    Where the media are displayed, indicates the display width
    Usage
    opt
    Datatype
    teidata.outputMeasurement
    @height
    Where the media are displayed, indicates the display height
    Usage
    opt
    Datatype
    teidata.outputMeasurement
    @scale
    Where the media are displayed, indicates a scale factor to be applied when generating the desired display size
    Usage
    opt
    Datatype
    teidata.numeric
